documentation:
## Catalog Cloud Authentication

### Prerequisites

-   Create a Catalog Cloud account.

### Supported Authentication Methods

-   API key


### Related Resources

Refer to [Catalog Cloud documentation](https://docs.pim.fynd.com/documentation) for more information about the different features and services.

### Using API Key

To configure this secret, you'll need:

1. **API token**: Refer to the [Catalog Cloud API token documentation](https://docs.pim.fynd.com/documentation/docs/manage-account#token) for detailed instructions on getting your API key.

meta.description: Please go to tokens page on Catalog Cloud console to get API token.
Choose the type of authentication you want to use.
